amendatorysection.para: The Tax Commissioner, whenever he or she deems it necessary to insure compliance with the provisions of sections 57-701 to 57-719, may require any person subject to the tax to deposit with the Tax Commissioner suitable indemnity bond to insure payment of the taxes, levied under the provisions of sections 57-701 to 57-719, as the Tax Commissioner may determine. Such security may be used if it becomes necessary to collect any tax, interest, or penalty due. Notice of the use thereof shall be given to such person by mail.
